name: Monsters At Work
description:
You just applied to a job, but your imagination is too strong, you are able to see some zombies at your workplace. The zombies are imaginary, but you feel like they're real and if they get to you it will look like you are just playing around and your boss will fire you for that. So your task is to keep the (imaginary)zombies that would only move when you're not looking at them away from you by clicking them. WHILE doing your job, because if you don't do your job correctly then boss will also fire you.

Summary : 

Click on the objects in front of you that says "click" immediately. Click in the zombies to rewind them back to their original position. The zombies will only move when you're not looking at them.

This game was made for the fourth brackeys game jam and was made in about 4-5 days.

I actually worked on the visuals for this game unlike my previous jam game that has terrible visuals.

Controls :
Left mouse button - basically does everything
